name: Level Six Badhass Adjustable Barrel Harness
description: Few things are better than a plastic barrel for holding your canoe-touring pantry. But a barrel is an awkward thing to portage. This super-comfy harness has integrated back support and breathable mesh on the shoulder and waist contact areas to make the task much more comfortable.Made of diamond grid-reinforced polyester.Adjusts to fit 60 and 30L barrels.Straps are ballistic nylon.Air Mesh padding throughout structured shoulder harness and waist belt.
